interface.name: 0manup
interface.description:
# 0manup
Is a simple tool, with one purpose: Given an incomplete (or incorrect) [ZeroInstall](http://0install.net/) feed, it will generate / update correct <manifest-digest> elements as needed, and update implementation IDs (if they are manifest-based IDs and the manifest is incorrect).
It requires that any required <archive> or <file> URLs be present as local files in the current working directory (it won't actually download files).
